title: Paul Renner's original 'g' for Futura
content:
I'm a big fan of Renner's original lowercase 'g' which was rejected and eventually replaced with the current one. Does anyone know if a Futura font exists that contains the original 'g' as a alt character? Is it available in any other form?

Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013043133im_/http:/typophile.com/files/RennerG_6738.jpg)
author: Ngoc Ngo

comments.content: Also in the [Futura Open Type Pro](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013043133/http:/www.fontshop.de/sukr.php3?ch=%2Ffontproductdetailc.php3%3Fns%3D1%26sns%3D0%26ns%3D1%26sns%3D0%26co%3D%26co2%3D%26id%3D6034870) by Elsner \* Flake. See the PDF »for OpenType Features Futura Text«.
it would be cool as an alternate in something like neutraface...
